component.name: RunManager
component.selected: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor

task.summary: Default task

Initial Commit Some AI working Partial attribute for summons
Need to change minion checks to cache the script instead of whole GO
Split Summon and Enemy AI Added states for enemy detection, chase and attack (not finished)

Initial Commit Some AI working Partial attribute for summons
Need to change minion checks to cache the script instead of whole GO

Minions have a recall delay now so they're not stuck attacking.
Somehow multiple minions can get summoned on one interaction - breaks a lot of things. Investigate!
Checks on minion list duplication implemented Changed some logic on minion states Added 'target' property for minions to reduce overhead in update (I think?)
Added basic patrol routine for enemy AI Added random waypoints generation for enemy patrol routine

Fixed minion send position (was using camera.forward when should've used only camera direction) Integrated the find destination and sendminion methods into one for simplicity Added sarcophagus animation when opening
Fixed minion targetting barricades as well as destructibles (missed a tag) and removed redundant dmg routine
Added leash to return minions when they chase too far
Added a line of sight check on nearby enemies to only chase visible ones
Fixed vector math for line of sight Improved enemy targetting (was broken badly)
Refactored movement in minion AI to happen in routines instead Changed the target finding to get index 0 always TODO: Sort target finding to aim nearest first TODO: Retarget when blocked?
Added animation triggers for attack and check for attack state Need to sync up animation with sound and damage
Enemy search now happens on a time delay instead of every frame
Added animation triggered attack Added animator script reference and setDeadAnim for attributes
Fixed minion forward raycast bypassing first obstacle

Changed recall to revert to false after getting close to target position Changed updatePosition to check distance between target and transform instead of using navmesh agent distance (inaccurate/not updating quick enough)
Added missing untracked files... shame to me
Set minion to always turn towards target during attack (track) TODO: Consider not tracking while in attack animation (would need to check the animation time itself as the state doesn't change)
Agent set destination not working in coroutine... works in update. WIP
'Fixed' agent following... (was just a stupid mistake - set 0 as speed in editor) Added hear check - dependant on target velocity (just a != 0 check)
Peasant forward animation in. Minion death animation fixed (new state that does nothing + disabling hitbox to avoid making more hits)
Added finding child by tag to animator
Changed find child by tag to a void that sets the hitbox. Need some help figuring how to return from recursive =/
Fixed enemy switching target
Fixed up enemy AI chase routine (hopefuly)
Delay on target check breaks things
Extracted fov check to its own method
Added same tag damage check (disables friendly fire) Added coroutine tracking in Enemy AI (might help avoid overflow ?)
Still working on coroutines. Sometimes there's an overflow, but normal run stacktrace seems fine (only a single coroutine running at a time ? )
Added limit to number of summons. Changed enemies to only switch layer on death so there's no accidental on trigger effects
Added difficulty handler in options
Target search sorts by distance and returns closest for enemy AI (experimental)
Added remove body coroutine for minions
Added friendly fire check (compare root tag)
Added checking for dead bodies not to take more damage
Disabling collider on minion bodies to prevent resummoning
Added difficulty scaling to spawn limit, time and enemy attributes
Barebones for enemy alerting in. Some issues with index out of range Overflow even more common - need to try a fix
Moved updating position to its own method in Enemy AI
Simplified canSee and canHear
Simplified minion AI find target
Specified alert to be only used by enemies. Simplified some collision and enemy checking in summon AI
Added check for no sound on audio player

Added body remove to destructibles (still need to 'animate' that) Added properly for reset of targetting destructibles on minions Added .5 stopping distance for destructibles : enemy follow in unity depending on what's being targetted
Added chance (0-100) for alert to happen and exposed in editor Changed targetting destructibles to only seek destination once (AI was getting confused repeating raycasts)
